original_title: ヤンキー女子校生報復レイプ制裁
overview: Emiri Sawai, a returnee school girl. She is a problem child who stands out even at school. She is always playing with someone. After school that day, she called the bullied Tomita to the bathroom and forced him to masturbate in front of her, but this humiliation made Tomita...
title: Yankee Girls School Student Retaliation Rape Punishment Tear
